When use arcreader to read some record from ARC file ,there are some errors:

java -Xmx256m -Dheritrix.home=.. org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader IAH-20040713084430-00000-ansi2003.arc

if I want to get the record which offset is 5448(http://www.google.com/intl/zh-CN/ch):

java -Xmx256m -Dheritrix.home=.. org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader --offset=5448 IAH-20040713084430-00000-ansi2003.arc
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader.computeMetaData(ARCReader.java:375)
        at org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader.createARCRecord(ARCReader.java:298)
        at org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader.next(ARCReader.java:232)
        at org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader.get(ARCReader.java:151)
        at org.archive.io.arc.ARCReader.main(ARCReader.java:586)

the attachment is the ARC file I use!

ansi
